message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with a price of $10,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
